nodes.text: The Scurrg H-6 prototype bomber was an experimental bomber.

The Scurrg H-6 was created five years before the Battle of Naboo by the Nubian Design Collective, who hoped to sell the design to the Naboo. However, the Naboo had no need for such a bomber, and the original prototype was stolen by the Feeorin pirate Nym, who later named it Havoc. Several other prototypes were produced with only minor improvements, but the price tag on the starfighter dissuaded a number of potential buyers from investing in it.
